snippet: Helen K. Kim and Noah S. Leavitt, who married after meeting in graduate school, share a scholarly interest in marriages like theirs.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column on married couple Helen K. Kim and Noah S. Leavitt, who have both a personal and scholarly interest in intermarriage between Asian-Americans and American Jews; couple has published a major research paper on the subject.
lead_paragraph: Helen K. Kim and Noah S. Leavitt, who married after meeting in graduate school, share a scholarly interest in marriages like theirs.

headline.print_headline: A Jewish-Asian Couple’s Union Leads to a Scholarly Interest in Intermarriage
headline.main: A Jewish-Asian Couple’s Union Leads to a Scholarly Interest in Intermarriage
